attributes.review: i wanted to learn all about the art of playing cars but instead there was some big orange man all over it 🤬🤬🤬🤬would not recommend😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: Horrible App!!!!!!

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to try and understand where president trump was coming from, but it took a whole day just to download. not only that weird things started to happen i got corona virus and  drank some bleach to get rid of it ,my toes fell off ,and nose stopped working. i also has trouble going to sleep please for your safety do not get this app.
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: Probably THE WORST app. It stole my credit card info and all my money was emptied out in the last 24 hours. I hate this app and shut it down!!!
attributes.title: Ugh

attributes.review: Took forever to download, my phone is now not ringing because of this app. Awful disgusting wouldn’t ever recommend.
attributes.title: Horrible awful nasty

attributes.review: Do I really need to go into detail? This app is horrible. So many glitches AND so much spam. Really!? Absolutely unacceptable! Trump will not be getting my vote this year! This app should be banned...
attributes.title: So bad

attributes.review: I’m extremely disappointed!! It took forever to download and it glitches my whole phone! I hope they take this app down!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support the homophobic, racist, mysogonsitic, police supporting campaign. But, I can’t even download the app which took forever I mean what’s a Karen Republican like me supposed to do now “frowny face emoticon”
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: This app is seriously so horrible. It slows down my phone, promotes stupid, racist, homophobic, bigoted content, and is spreading a virus onto my device (of the Corona variety). 0/5, Would not recommend.🤢🤢🤮🤮✨
attributes.title: Absolute Garbage

attributes.review: This app not only made me want to delete it immediately, it was also so incredibly horrid. Such a dumb and useless app made by useless people who are absolutely racist ❤️.
attributes.title: Absolutely gross

attributes.review: Took to long to download and it started taking my personal data and hacking my stuff. Wouldn’t recommend to anyone
attributes.title: Trash🤮
